@DuchessSpotting Agreed. I am just hearing now this will affect Canadians with dual citizenship from the 7 countries and that pisses me off
I think I'm going to start to cry soon I can't take this anymore. Everyday it just gets worse and worse and he's only been President 8 days!
I'm not American but I DON'T CARE THIS IS JUST BEYOND WRONG!!
Trump is just going too far now!! https://t.co/3Iecmm7bmN
*cries* Ugh please no...why?! I want the Obamas back https://t.co/umFxxOUXLo
Another user posted on Sunday that they spotted them leaving Palm Springs..Go figure all we know is Malia is at Sundance
For those wondering People said they left w/parents Friday at Joint Andrews Base.Tmz said Saturday from Maryland w/Branson's jet.
The press confuses me need to get their facts straight but nice to see that the Obama girls are now able to do their own thing.
I have been through severe depression twice so I know how you feel! If you ever feel alone I will always be there to listen #bellletstalk
I learned that lesson 3 years ago when I had hit my low point and since then I have made so many of my dreams come true #bellletstalk
Don't let people tell u that u can't don't let them bring u down. There will always be people who love & believe in u #bellletstalk
@drewski1974 @celinedion She said it in both french and english not just in french. Plus most her vids are filmed in both languages
Nothing made me happier than what I saw today. Around the world people came together and stood up for what they believed in. #lovetrumpshate
Been up since 8am and I am exhausted so I'm finally off to bed. What a day...*sigh*
Did he just say it didn't rain today? Is he nuts? Did he watch the same Inauguration I did?
Wait where's Sasha and Malia? Were they already on the plane or something?
I'm going back to bed I can't watch this anymore #inaguration
Wow it's been almost 20 years since Princess Diana visited Angola. Her visit made me want to help in some way so I donated to @theHALOTrust
@JLo just posted this on her instagram and I had to share. How we wish Obama speech would've ended tonight. https://t.co/lPqCUFVtf3
These two ❤️ https://t.co/ueJ9jJWk4A
I am feeling so many emotions and I am not even American. That is how much this man has touched people around the world #obamafarewell
Crying my eyes out. I love the Obama family!!!! #ObamaFarewell
Happy 35th Birthday to the Duchess of Cambridge🎉 This woman kept me alive during my darkest days and for that ill be forever grateful
I wanted @jtimberlake to win Best Original Song but besides that I'm mostly agreeing with tonight's results #GoldenGlobes
I am not worthy. Incredible speech by Meryl Streep #GoldenGlobes
The Queen was just thanked on the Golden Globes! I love Claire Foy!
So I don't brag...like ever but I still cannot believe I was lucky enough last yr to make my dream of meeting Wills and Kate come true!!
I think I just cried reading the Vancouver Sun's article of what will happen should the Queen die. It really hit me for once.
Btw I am officially convinced I curse the Canucks whenever I watch so if me not watching means more wins then no problem
Thought it was awesome seeing @theroyaleditor on @TheRoyalsOnE last night. I was telling my dad look he's the one I ran into back in Sept
Day 2 of 2017 and still feeling miserable with this cold ugh
Yay @Adele tonight on @CBC with her 2015 concert from NYC's Radio City Music Hall
@SPerryPeoplemag @WhatKateWore @RegalEyes I missed out on this sadly because I was quite sick and was not home but looks fantastic WTG!!
So 2017 is going well...my first real cold I'm years...just great
I understand how the Queen must feel. I too have a cold and I feel just awful right now
@GlobalBC please make the fireworks available on demand. I didn't see them in full and want to rewatch them. Same thing happened last year
Happy New Year!!🎉🎊🍾 #Hello2017 #HappyNewYear
I can't believe it's snowing in Vancouver on NYE!! ⛄️❄️ Love it! I am so happy I have no plans for tonight
Happy New Year to all my international followers!!! 🍷🎉🎊
Debbie Reynolds gave me the one quote I've used almost all my life "Being normal is vastly overrated"
THIS IS NOT HAPPENING NO PLEASE NO #RipDebbieReynolds omg how will I ever be able to watch Halloweentown again?!! 😭
No not Debbie Reynolds too I refuse. YOU CAN'T DO THIS 2016!!!
Dear 2016: Stay the hell away from The Queen. Thank you in advance,Christina

As usual I had way too much Christmas dinner. In a total food coma right now. Luckily we don't have as many leftovers as we normally do
And with that I can now wish all my followers a Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!!!
@Duke_StMamas luckily for me everything turned out fine in the end but it was a scary few weeks
@Duke_StMamas don't think age matters. Anyone can be perfectly healthy one min and then get sick the next.
So looking forward to Chrismas and spending time with the fam. I feel so blessed to alive and well after my health scare last month
@alanpoole888 totally it was a fun day. Hoping their predictions are right and we also get a white Xmas day
That's it I've lost faith in the world. Everyone has gone mad
